pr_title: Groupby function should group fields based on value/name

timeline.message: Groupby function should group fields based on value/name
Groupby function should group fields based on value/name
Groupby function should group fields based on value/name
Groupby function should group fields based on value/name

timeline.bodyText:
In theory you could collapse these, but not absolutely required:
case "GENDER":
case "GEN":
case "BIRTHDAY":
      firstKey = fieldBase.getValueString()
      break;
case "AGE":
case "AG":
       secondKey = fieldBase.getValueString()
      break;
timeline.author: drewfarris

replies.bodyText: Got it. I rebased and incorporated your suggestion. Thanks!!
replies.author: d-hwang
